alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 07 at 3:35AM MDT until April 07 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Kiowa, Bent, Prowers and Baca Counties. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 7 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages will be possible. Travel will be difficult due to strong cross winds and blowing dust, especially on east west oriented roadways.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County; Western Kiowa County
